item.title: Introducing GroupMe Archiver
item.description: I was recently looking into various ways of archiving old chats into something more future proof, but it seems like these tools are very limited. They either don’t exist, or only work for specific scenarios like one-on-one chats without attachments. Today, the situation gets a bit better for one platform, GroupMe. GroupMe is a platform focused on group messaging, and features nice subtle features like likes per message, attachments and so on.
